title: Classic Garlic Bread
description: Crispy homemade garlic bread with herbs
ingredients: 1 French baguette||1/2 cup butter softened||4 cloves garlic minced||2 tablespoons fresh parsley||1/4 teaspoon salt
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F||Cut baguette in half lengthwise||Mix butter, garlic, parsley, and salt||Spread mixture evenly on bread||Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden||Slice and serve hot
recipe_notes: For extra flavor, add a pinch of oregano to the butter mixture

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: 1 large head romaine lettuce||1/2 cup Caesar dressing||1/4 cup grated Parmesan||1 cup croutons||2 anchovy fillets||1 clove garlic||2 tablespoons lemon juice||1 tablespoon Worcestershire
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce||Make dressing by mashing garlic and anchovies||Whisk in lemon juice and Worcestershire||Toss lettuce with dressing||Top with Parmesan and croutons||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Chill the plates beforehand for best presentation

title: Green Smoothie
description: Nutrient-packed smoothie with spinach and fruit
ingredients: 2 cups fresh spinach||1 banana||1 cup pineapple chunks||1/2 avocado||1 cup coconut water||1 tablespoon honey||1 tablespoon lime juice||1/2 cup ice
instructions: Add spinach and coconut water to blender first||Add banana, pineapple, and avocado||Add honey and lime juice||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend again||Pour into glasses and serve immediately
recipe_notes: Add protein powder for post-workout boost

title: Trail Mix
description: Healthy mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruit
ingredients: 1/2 cup almonds||1/2 cup walnuts||1/2 cup cashews||1/4 cup pumpkin seeds||1/4 cup sunflower seeds||1/2 cup dried cranberries||1/4 cup dark chocolate chips||1/4 teaspoon sea salt
instructions: Combine all nuts and seeds in large bowl||Add dried cranberries and chocolate chips||Sprinkle with sea salt||Toss to combine evenly||Store in airtight container||Portion into small bags for grab-and-go snacks
recipe_notes: Store in cool, dry place for up to 2 weeks

title: Grilled Chicken Breast
description: Perfectly seasoned and grilled chicken breast
ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts||2 tablespoons olive oil||1 teaspoon garlic powder||1 teaspoon paprika||1 teaspoon oregano||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||1 tablespoon lemon juice
instructions: Pound chicken to even thickness||Mix oil with all seasonings and lemon juice||Marinate chicken 30 minutes||Preheat grill to medium-high||Grill 6-7 minutes per side||Check internal temperature reaches 165°F||Rest 5 minutes before slicing
recipe_notes: Let chicken rest after cooking to retain juices

title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy cheesy dip with spinach and artichoke hearts
ingredients: 1 package cream cheese softened||1/4 cup mayonnaise||1/4 cup sour cream||1/4 cup Parmesan cheese||1/4 cup Romano cheese||2 cloves garlic minced||1/2 teaspoon dried basil||1 can artichoke hearts chopped||1 package frozen spinach thawed
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F||Mix cream cheese, mayo, sour cream, and cheeses||Stir in garlic and basil||Add artichoke hearts and spinach||Transfer to baking dish||Bake 20-25 minutes until bubbly||Serve with tortilla chips
recipe_notes: Squeeze excess water from spinach thoroughly

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups flour||1 cup brown sugar||1/2 cup white sugar||1 cup butter softened||2 eggs||2 teaspoons vanilla||1 teaspoon baking soda||1 teaspoon salt||2 cups chocolate chips
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F||Cream butter and sugars||Add eggs and vanilla||Mix in dry ingredients||Fold in chocolate chips||Drop onto baking sheets||Bake 9-11 minutes||Cool on wire racks
recipe_notes: Don't overbake - cookies continue cooking on hot pan

title: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with peppers and onions
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast sliced||2 bell peppers sliced||1 large onion sliced||2 tablespoons olive oil||2 teaspoons chili powder||1 teaspoon cumin||1 teaspoon paprika||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||Salt and pepper||8 tortillas||Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Season chicken with spices||Heat oil in large skillet||Cook chicken 5-7 minutes||Add peppers and onions||Cook until vegetables are tender||Warm tortillas||Serve with toppings
recipe_notes: Cast iron skillet gives best searing results

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes perfect for breakfast
ingredients: 2 cups flour||2 tablespoons sugar||2 teaspoons baking powder||1 teaspoon salt||2 eggs||1 3/4 cups milk||1/4 cup melted butter||1 teaspoon vanilla
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in large bowl||Whisk wet ingredients separately||Combine wet and dry until just mixed||Heat griddle to 375°F||Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake||Cook until bubbles form, flip once||Serve with syrup
recipe_notes: Don't overmix batter - lumps are okay

title: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Classic club sandwich with turkey, bacon, and fresh vegetables
ingredients: 8 slices bread toasted||8 oz sliced turkey||8 strips bacon||4 lettuce leaves||2 tomatoes sliced||1/4 cup mayonnaise||Salt and pepper
instructions: Toast bread until golden||Cook bacon until crispy||Spread mayo on toast||Layer turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato||Season with salt and pepper||Cut diagonally and secure with toothpicks||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Use thick-cut bacon for best texture

title: Cha (Bengali Tea)
description: Traditional Bengali milk tea with aromatic spices
ingredients: 2 cups water||1 cup milk||2 tsp tea leaves||2 tsp sugar||2 cardamom pods||1 inch ginger||1 cinnamon stick
instructions: Boil water with spices||Add tea leaves and boil for 2 minutes||Add milk and sugar||Simmer for 3-4 minutes||Strain and serve hot
recipe_notes: Adjust sugar and milk to taste

title: Borhani
description: Spiced yogurt drink - traditional Bengali digestive
ingredients: 2 cups yogurt||1 cup water||2 tbsp sugar||1 tsp roasted cumin powder||1/2 tsp black salt||1/4 tsp chaat masala||Mint leaves||Ice cubes
instructions: Whisk yogurt until smooth||Add water, sugar, and spices||Blend until frothy||Add ice cubes and mint||Serve chilled
recipe_notes: Perfect after heavy meals

title: Shorbot (Rose Syrup Drink)
ingredients: 3 tbsp rose syrup||2 cups cold water||1 tbsp lemon juice||1 tsp sugar||Ice cubes||Rose petals for garnish
instructions: Mix rose syrup with cold water||Add lemon juice and sugar||Stir well||Add ice cubes||Garnish with rose petals||Serve chilled
recipe_notes: Popular during summer and Ramadan

title: Aam Panna
description: Raw mango drink with cooling spices
ingredients: 2 raw mangoes||4 cups water||3 tbsp sugar||1 tsp roasted cumin powder||1/2 tsp black salt||1/4 tsp black pepper||Mint leaves||Ice cubes
instructions: Boil mangoes until soft||Peel and extract pulp||Blend with water and spices||Add sugar and mix well||Serve chilled with mint and ice
recipe_notes: Excellent for summer heat

title: Lassi (Sweet)
ingredients: 2 cups yogurt||1/2 cup milk||3 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp cardamom powder||1 tbsp rose water||Ice cubes||Chopped almonds for garnish
instructions: Whisk yogurt until smooth||Add milk, sugar, cardamom||Blend until frothy||Add rose water and ice||Garnish with almonds||Serve chilled
recipe_notes: Can be made with mango for variation

title: Masala Chai
description: Spiced Indian tea with aromatic herbs
ingredients: 2 cups water||1 cup milk||2 tsp tea leaves||2 tbsp sugar||4 cardamom pods||1 inch ginger||4 cloves||1 cinnamon stick||1/4 tsp black pepper
instructions: Crush spices lightly||Boil water with spices||Add tea leaves and boil||Add milk and sugar||Simmer until aromatic||Strain and serve hot
recipe_notes: Immunity booster with warming spices

title: Nimbu Paani
description: Fresh lime water with salt and spices
ingredients: 3 limes||3 cups water||2 tbsp sugar||1 tsp salt||1/2 tsp roasted cumin powder||1/4 tsp black pepper||Mint leaves||Ice cubes
instructions: Extract lime juice||Mix with water, sugar, salt||Add cumin powder and pepper||Stir well||Add mint and ice||Serve chilled
recipe_notes: Natural electrolyte drink

title: Thandai
description: Festive milk drink with nuts and spices
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1/4 cup almonds||2 tbsp cashews||1 tbsp pistachios||2 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp cardamom powder||Pinch of saffron||1/4 tsp fennel powder||Ice cubes
instructions: Soak nuts for 2 hours||Grind to smooth paste||Mix with milk and spices||Add sugar and blend||Chill for 1 hour||Serve with ice||Garnish with chopped nuts
recipe_notes: Traditional Holi festival drink

title: Jal Jeera
description: Cumin-spiced water with mint and lemon
ingredients: 3 cups water||2 tbsp lemon juice||2 tsp roasted cumin powder||1 tsp black salt||1/2 tsp regular salt||1 tbsp sugar||Mint leaves||1/4 tsp chaat masala||Ice cubes
instructions: Mix all ingredients except ice||Stir until sugar dissolves||Add fresh mint leaves||Serve over ice||Garnish with mint sprig
recipe_notes: Cooling summer drink with digestive properties

title: Coconut Water
ingredients: 2 fresh tender coconuts||1 tbsp sugar (optional)||1 tsp lemon juice||Pinch of salt||Ice cubes
instructions: Extract water from coconuts||Add sugar if desired||Mix with lemon juice||Add pinch of salt||Serve chilled with ice
recipe_notes: Natural electrolyte drink, perfect for hot weather

title: Orange Juice
ingredients: 6 large oranges||1 tbsp sugar (optional)||Pinch of salt||Ice cubes||Orange slices for garnish
instructions: Cut oranges in half||Extract juice using juicer||Strain if desired||Add sugar and salt||Stir well||Serve over ice with orange slices
recipe_notes: High in vitamin C, best consumed fresh

title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes||1 cup yogurt||1/2 cup milk||2 tbsp honey||1/4 tsp cardamom powder||Ice cubes||Mango slices for garnish
instructions: Peel and chop mangoes||Blend with yogurt and milk||Add honey and cardamom||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend again||Garnish with mango slices
recipe_notes: Perfect breakfast drink or dessert

title: Banana Milkshake
ingredients: 3 ripe bananas||2 cups milk||3 tbsp sugar||1/2 tsp vanilla extract||1/4 tsp cinnamon powder||Ice cubes||Whipped cream for topping
instructions: Peel and slice bananas||Blend with milk and sugar||Add vanilla and cinnamon||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend||Top with whipped cream
recipe_notes: Kids' favorite, rich in potassium

title: Iced Coffee
description: Cold coffee with milk and sugar
ingredients: 2 cups strong coffee||1/2 cup milk||3 tbsp sugar||1 tsp vanilla extract||Ice cubes||Whipped cream||Cocoa powder for dusting
instructions: Brew strong coffee and cool||Mix with milk and sugar||Add vanilla extract||Fill glass with ice||Pour coffee over ice||Top with whipped cream and cocoa
recipe_notes: Perfect summer coffee drink

title: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate drink
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1/4 cup cocoa powder||3 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp vanilla extract||Pinch of salt||Whipped cream||Marshmallows||Chocolate shavings
instructions: Heat milk in saucepan||Whisk in cocoa powder||Add sugar, vanilla, salt||Whisk until smooth||Heat until steaming||Serve with toppings
recipe_notes: Perfect winter comfort drink

title: Lemonade
ingredients: 6 lemons||4 cups water||1/2 cup sugar||Ice cubes||Lemon slices||Mint leaves for garnish
instructions: Extract lemon juice||Mix with water and sugar||Stir until sugar dissolves||Add ice cubes||Garnish with lemon slices and mint||Serve chilled
recipe_notes: Refreshing summer classic

title: Green Tea
ingredients: 2 cups water||2 tsp green tea leaves||1 tsp honey (optional)||Lemon slice||Mint leaves
instructions: Heat water to 80°C (not boiling)||Add green tea leaves||Steep for 2-3 minutes||Strain and add honey||Garnish with lemon and mint||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Don't over-steep to avoid bitterness

title: Strawberry Smoothie
ingredients: 2 cups strawberries||1 cup yogurt||1/2 cup milk||2 tbsp honey||1/4 tsp vanilla extract||Ice cubes||Strawberry slices for garnish
instructions: Hull and wash strawberries||Blend with yogurt and milk||Add honey and vanilla||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend again||Garnish with strawberry slices
recipe_notes: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants

title: Pineapple Juice
ingredients: 1 medium pineapple||2 tbsp sugar||1 cup water||Pinch of salt||Ice cubes||Pineapple wedges for garnish
instructions: Peel and core pineapple||Cut into chunks||Blend with water and sugar||Strain if desired||Add salt and ice||Garnish with pineapple wedges
recipe_notes: Tropical enzyme-rich drink

title: Watermelon Juice
ingredients: 4 cups watermelon cubes||1 tbsp lime juice||1 tsp sugar||Pinch of salt||Ice cubes||Mint leaves for garnish
instructions: Remove seeds from watermelon||Blend until smooth||Add lime juice and sugar||Strain if desired||Serve over ice||Garnish with mint
recipe_notes: Hydrating summer drink

title: Mojito (Virgin)
ingredients: 12 mint leaves||2 limes||2 tbsp sugar||2 cups soda water||Ice cubes||Lime wedges for garnish
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar||Add lime juice||Fill glass with ice||Top with soda water||Stir gently||Garnish with lime wedges and mint
recipe_notes: Refreshing Cuban-inspired mocktail

title: Apple Cider
ingredients: 4 cups apple juice||2 cinnamon sticks||4 whole cloves||1 star anise||1 orange peel||2 tbsp honey||Apple slices for garnish
instructions: Heat apple juice with spices||Simmer for 15 minutes||Add honey and stir||Strain and serve hot||Garnish with apple slices
recipe_notes: Perfect autumn warming drink

title: Chocolate Milkshake
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1/4 cup chocolate syrup||2 scoops vanilla ice cream||1 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp vanilla extract||Whipped cream||Chocolate chips for topping
instructions: Blend milk with chocolate syrup||Add ice cream and sugar||Blend until smooth||Add vanilla extract||Pour into glasses||Top with whipped cream and chocolate chips
recipe_notes: Indulgent treat for chocolate lovers

title: Ginger Ale
ingredients: 2 inches fresh ginger||1 cup sugar||1 cup water||3 cups soda water||2 tbsp lemon juice||Ice cubes||Lemon slices for garnish
instructions: Grate ginger finely||Boil with sugar and water||Simmer for 10 minutes||Strain and cool||Mix with soda water and lemon juice||Serve over ice||Garnish with lemon slices
recipe_notes: Natural digestive aid

title: Fruit Punch
ingredients: 2 cups pineapple juice||1 cup orange juice||1 cup cranberry juice||1/2 cup lemon juice||2 cups ginger ale||1/4 cup sugar||Ice cubes||Mixed fruit for garnish
instructions: Mix all fruit juices||Add sugar and stir||Chill for 2 hours||Add ginger ale before serving||Serve over ice||Garnish with mixed fruits
recipe_notes: Perfect for parties and gatherings

title: Bhang Thandai
description: Traditional Holi drink with cannabis leaves
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1/4 cup almonds||2 tbsp cashews||1 tbsp pistachios||2 tbsp bhang leaves||3 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp cardamom powder||Pinch of saffron||1/4 tsp black pepper||Ice cubes
instructions: Soak nuts and bhang leaves for 4 hours||Grind to fine paste||Mix with milk and spices||Add sugar and blend||Strain through fine cloth||Chill for 2 hours||Serve with ice
recipe_notes: Traditional festival drink - consume responsibly

title: Kulfi Falooda
description: Rich milk dessert drink with vermicelli
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1/4 cup sugar||1/4 cup kulfi||2 tbsp falooda sev||1 tbsp rose syrup||2 tbsp basil seeds||1 tbsp chopped almonds||Ice cubes
instructions: Soak basil seeds for 30 minutes||Boil falooda sev until soft||Cool completely||Layer rose syrup in glass||Add basil seeds and falooda||Pour chilled milk||Top with kulfi and almonds
recipe_notes: Popular summer dessert drink

title: Sattu Drink
ingredients: 3 tbsp sattu (roasted gram flour)||2 cups water||2 tbsp lemon juice||1 tsp salt||1/2 tsp roasted cumin powder||1 green chili||Mint leaves||1 tbsp jaggery||Ice cubes
instructions: Mix sattu with little water to avoid lumps||Add remaining water gradually||Mix in lemon juice, salt, cumin||Add chopped chili and mint||Sweeten with jaggery||Serve chilled with ice
recipe_notes: High protein traditional drink

title: Kala Khatta
ingredients: 1 cup black plum juice||2 cups water||3 tbsp sugar||1 tsp black salt||1/2 tsp chaat masala||1 tbsp lemon juice||Ice cubes||Black plum for garnish
instructions: Mix plum juice with water||Add sugar and stir until dissolved||Add black salt and chaat masala||Mix in lemon juice||Serve over ice||Garnish with fresh black plum
recipe_notes: Popular street drink with tangy flavor

title: Buttermilk Chaas
ingredients: 2 cups buttermilk||1/2 cup water||1 tsp roasted cumin powder||1/2 tsp salt||1/4 tsp black pepper||1 green chili||Mint leaves||1/2 inch ginger||Ice cubes
instructions: Blend buttermilk with water||Add cumin powder and salt||Add chopped chili, ginger, mint||Blend until frothy||Add black pepper||Serve chilled with ice||Garnish with mint
recipe_notes: Digestive drink perfect after meals

title: Espresso
ingredients: 2 tbsp espresso ground coffee||1/4 cup water||Sugar to taste
instructions: Heat water to 90-95°C||Pack coffee grounds in portafilter||Extract shot for 25-30 seconds||Serve immediately||Add sugar if desired
recipe_notes: Base for many coffee drinks

title: Cappuccino
description: Classic Italian coffee with steamed milk
ingredients: 1 shot espresso||1/3 cup milk||Sugar to taste||Cocoa powder for dusting
instructions: Brew espresso shot||Steam milk until frothy||Pour steamed milk over espresso||Top with milk foam||Dust with cocoa powder||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Perfect morning coffee

title: Matcha Latte
ingredients: 1 tsp matcha powder||2 tbsp hot water||1 cup milk||2 tbsp sugar||1/4 tsp vanilla extract||Whipped cream for topping
instructions: Whisk matcha with hot water||Heat milk with sugar||Add vanilla extract||Froth milk if desired||Pour matcha into cup||Add hot milk||Top with whipped cream
recipe_notes: Antioxidant-rich Japanese drink

title: Bubble Tea
ingredients: 1/2 cup tapioca pearls||2 cups water||2 tbsp black tea||1/4 cup sugar||1 cup milk||Ice cubes||Brown sugar syrup
instructions: Cook tapioca pearls until soft||Brew strong black tea||Add sugar to tea||Cool completely||Add cooked pearls to glass||Pour tea and milk||Add ice and brown sugar syrup
recipe_notes: Popular Taiwanese drink

title: Horchata
ingredients: 1 cup rice||5 cups water||1 cinnamon stick||1 cup milk||1/2 cup sugar||1 tsp vanilla extract||1/4 tsp salt||Ground cinnamon for garnish
instructions: Soak rice with cinnamon for 2 hours||Blend with soaking water||Strain through fine mesh||Add milk, sugar, vanilla, salt||Blend until smooth||Chill for 2 hours||Serve with cinnamon garnish
recipe_notes: Traditional Mexican drink

title: Smoothie Bowl Drink
ingredients: 1 banana||1 cup mixed berries||1/2 cup yogurt||1/4 cup granola||2 tbsp honey||1 tbsp chia seeds||1/4 cup coconut flakes||1/4 cup almond milk
instructions: Blend banana, berries, yogurt||Add almond milk for consistency||Pour into bowl||Top with granola, chia seeds||Add coconut flakes||Drizzle with honey||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Instagram-worthy healthy drink

title: Kombucha
ingredients: 1 SCOBY||1 cup starter tea||8 cups water||4 tea bags||1/2 cup sugar||Fruit for flavoring (optional)
instructions: Brew strong tea with sugar||Cool to room temperature||Add SCOBY and starter tea||Cover with cloth||Ferment for 7-14 days||Strain and bottle||Add fruit for second fermentation||Chill before serving
recipe_notes: Probiotic drink good for gut health

title: Protein Shake
ingredients: 1 scoop protein powder||1 banana||1 cup milk||1 tbsp peanut butter||1 tsp honey||1/2 cup ice||1 tbsp oats||Berries for topping
instructions: Add all ingredients to blender||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend again||Pour into glass||Top with berries||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Perfect post-workout recovery drink

title: Detox Water
description: Infused water with fruits and herbs
ingredients: 4 cups water||1 cucumber sliced||1 lemon sliced||10 mint leaves||1 tbsp honey||Ice cubes||Lime wedges for garnish
instructions: Slice cucumber and lemon||Add to water with mint||Stir in honey||Refrigerate for 2 hours||Serve over ice||Garnish with lime wedges
recipe_notes: Hydrating drink for cleansing

title: Golden Milk
ingredients: 2 cups milk||1 tsp turmeric powder||1/2 tsp cinnamon powder||1/4 tsp ginger powder||Pinch of black pepper||2 tbsp honey||1/4 tsp vanilla extract||Coconut oil (optional)
instructions: Heat milk in saucepan||Add turmeric and spices||Whisk until smooth||Add honey and vanilla||Simmer for 5 minutes||Add coconut oil if desired||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Anti-inflammatory bedtime drink

title: Chia Fresca
ingredients: 2 tbsp chia seeds||2 cups water||2 tbsp lime juice||2 tbsp agave syrup||Pinch of salt||Lime slices for garnish||Mint leaves||Ice cubes
instructions: Soak chia seeds in water for 15 minutes||Stir occasionally to prevent clumping||Add lime juice and agave||Mix in salt||Serve over ice||Garnish with lime and mint
recipe_notes: Hydrating drink rich in omega-3

title: Hibiscus Tea
description: Tart herbal tea with health benefits
ingredients: 1/4 cup dried hibiscus flowers||3 cups water||2 tbsp honey||1 tbsp lemon juice||Cinnamon stick||Ice cubes||Lemon slices for garnish
instructions: Boil water with hibiscus flowers||Steep for 10 minutes||Strain and add honey||Add lemon juice and cinnamon||Serve hot or cold||Garnish with lemon slices
recipe_notes: Rich in antioxidants and vitamin C

title: Switchel
ingredients: 4 cups water||1/4 cup apple cider vinegar||1/4 cup honey||1 tbsp fresh ginger||1 tbsp lemon juice||Ice cubes||Apple slices for garnish
instructions: Grate fresh ginger||Mix with warm water and honey||Add vinegar and lemon juice||Stir until honey dissolves||Chill for 2 hours||Serve over ice||Garnish with apple slices
recipe_notes: Traditional haymaker's drink

title: Energy Drink
ingredients: 2 cups coconut water||1 banana||1 tbsp honey||1 tsp spirulina powder||1/2 cup pineapple juice||1 tbsp chia seeds||Ice cubes||Mint for garnish
instructions: Blend coconut water with banana||Add honey and spirulina||Mix in pineapple juice||Add chia seeds||Blend until smooth||Serve over ice||Garnish with mint
recipe_notes: Natural alternative to commercial energy drinks

title: Rosewater Lemonade
ingredients: 4 cups water||1/2 cup lemon juice||1/3 cup sugar||2 tbsp rosewater||Pink food coloring (optional)||Ice cubes||Rose petals for garnish||Lemon slices
instructions: Mix lemon juice with sugar||Add water and stir||Mix in rosewater||Add food coloring if desired||Chill for 1 hour||Serve over ice||Garnish with rose petals and lemon
recipe_notes: Elegant floral summer drink

title: Traditional Naan Bread
description: Soft and fluffy homemade naan bread
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup plain yogurt||1 teaspoon active dry yeast||1 teaspoon sugar||1/2 teaspoon salt||2 tablespoons oil||1/4 cup warm water||2 tablespoons butter for brushing
instructions: Mix yeast and sugar in warm water, let foam||Combine flour and salt||Add yogurt, oil, and yeast mixture||Knead into soft dough||Rest for 2 hours||Divide into 8 portions||Roll each portion||Cook on hot tawa/pan||Brush with butter while hot
recipe_notes: Keep the dough covered while resting to prevent drying

title: French Baguette
ingredients: 3 cups bread flour||1 1/4 cups warm water||1 teaspoon active dry yeast||1 1/2 teaspoons salt||1 tablespoon olive oil
instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water||Mix flour and salt||Add water and oil, knead 10 minutes||First rise 1 hour||Shape into baguettes||Second rise 45 minutes||Score tops||Bake at 450°F for 25-30 minutes||Cool on wire rack
recipe_notes: Steam in oven for crispy crust - place a pan of water on bottom rack

title: Paratha (Layered Flatbread)
ingredients: 2 cups whole wheat flour||3/4 cup water||1/2 teaspoon salt||3 tablespoons oil||2 tablespoons ghee for layering
instructions: Mix flour and salt||Add water and 1 tbsp oil, knead smooth dough||Rest 30 minutes||Divide into 6 portions||Roll thin, brush with ghee||Fold into layers||Roll again gently||Cook on hot tawa until golden spots appear||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Don't roll too thin after folding to maintain layers

title: Sourdough Bread
ingredients: 1 cup active sourdough starter||3 cups bread flour||1 1/4 cups water||1 1/2 teaspoons salt
instructions: Mix starter with water||Add flour and salt||Mix until combined||Bulk fermentation 4-6 hours with folds every 30 minutes||Shape loaf||Final proof 2-4 hours||Score and bake at 450°F for 45 minutes||Cool completely before slicing
recipe_notes: Maintain sourdough starter regularly for best results

title: Luchi (Bengali Fried Bread)
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 teaspoon salt||2 tablespoons oil||1/2 cup water||Oil for deep frying
instructions: Mix flour and salt||Add 2 tbsp oil and water||Knead smooth dough||Rest 20 minutes||Roll into small thin circles||Heat oil for deep frying||Fry luchi until puffed and golden||Drain on paper towels||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Roll very thin for best puffing, oil should be hot enough

title: Focaccia Bread
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour||1 1/4 cups warm water||2 teaspoons active dry yeast||1 teaspoon sugar||2 teaspoons salt||1/4 cup olive oil||2 tablespoons fresh rosemary||Sea salt for topping
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water||Mix flour and salt||Add water mixture and oil||Knead until smooth||Rise 1 hour||Press into oiled pan||Dimple surface||Top with rosemary and sea salt||Rise 30 minutes||Bake at 425°F for 25 minutes
recipe_notes: Use fingertips to create dimples for olive oil pools

title: Bakarkhani (Layered Sweet Bread)
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup milk||1/4 cup sugar||1/4 cup ghee||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon baking powder||2 tablespoons poppy seeds||1 tablespoon fennel seeds
instructions: Mix flour, salt, and baking powder||Heat milk with sugar until dissolved||Add ghee to flour||Mix with warm milk to form dough||Knead well and rest 1 hour||Roll thin, sprinkle seeds||Fold and roll again||Bake in clay oven or heavy pan||Cook until golden and crispy
recipe_notes: Traditional clay oven gives best flavor, but heavy pan works too

title: Dinner Rolls
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour||1 cup warm milk||2 tablespoons sugar||2 teaspoons active dry yeast||1 teaspoon salt||1/4 cup butter melted||1 egg||Butter for brushing
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm milk||Mix flour and salt||Add milk mixture, melted butter, and egg||Knead until smooth||Rise 1 hour||Shape into 12 rolls||Place in greased pan||Rise 45 minutes||Brush with butter||Bake at 375°F for 15-18 minutes
recipe_notes: Brush with butter before and after baking for soft crust

title: Chitoi Pitha (Rice Pancakes)
ingredients: 2 cups rice flour||2 1/2 cups water||1/2 teaspoon salt||1 tablespoon oil||Grated coconut for serving||Jaggery syrup for serving
instructions: Boil water with salt||Gradually add rice flour while stirring||Cook until thick paste forms||Cool slightly||Knead smooth||Make small balls||Flatten into thin discs||Steam for 10-12 minutes||Serve with coconut and jaggery
recipe_notes: Keep the batter consistency thick but workable

title: Brioche Bread
ingredients: 3 cups bread flour||1/4 cup sugar||1 teaspoon salt||2 teaspoons active dry yeast||4 eggs||1/2 cup butter softened||1/4 cup warm milk||1 egg for wash
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, salt, and yeast||Add eggs and milk||Knead 5 minutes||Gradually add butter||Knead until smooth and elastic||Rise 2 hours||Shape into loaf||Rise 1 hour||Brush with egg wash||Bake at 350°F for 35 minutes
recipe_notes: Dough will be sticky initially, keep kneading until smooth

title: Ruti (Whole Wheat Flatbread)
ingredients: 2 cups whole wheat flour||3/4 cup water||1/2 teaspoon salt||1 tablespoon oil
instructions: Mix flour and salt||Add water and oil||Knead smooth dough||Rest 15 minutes||Divide into 8 portions||Roll thin circles||Cook on hot tawa||Flip when bubbles form||Cook until light brown spots appear||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Don't use oil while cooking for authentic taste

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: 3 ripe bananas mashed||1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup melted butter||3/4 cup sugar||1 egg||1 teaspoon vanilla||1 teaspoon baking soda||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/3 cup chopped walnuts optional
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F||Mix mashed bananas with melted butter||Add sugar, egg, and vanilla||In separate bowl mix flour, baking soda, and salt||Combine wet and dry ingredients||Fold in walnuts if using||Pour into greased loaf pan||Bake 60-65 minutes
recipe_notes: Use very ripe bananas for best flavor and sweetness

title: Pav Bread
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup warm milk||2 tablespoons sugar||1 teaspoon active dry yeast||1/2 teaspoon salt||3 tablespoons butter||1 egg||Butter for brushing
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm milk||Mix flour and salt||Add milk mixture, butter, and egg||Knead smooth dough||Rise 1.5 hours||Shape into 8 small rolls||Place close together in pan||Rise 45 minutes||Brush with butter||Bake at 375°F for 18-20 minutes
recipe_notes: Place rolls touching each other for soft sides

title: Croissants
ingredients: 2 cups bread flour||1/2 cup warm milk||2 tablespoons sugar||1 teaspoon active dry yeast||1/2 teaspoon salt||2 tablespoons butter||1 cup cold butter for lamination||1 egg for wash
instructions: Make dough with flour, milk, sugar, yeast, salt, and 2 tbsp butter||Rise 1 hour||Roll out, place cold butter block||Fold and roll 3 times with 30-min rests||Shape into triangles||Roll into croissant shape||Rise 2 hours||Brush with egg||Bake at 400°F for 15-18 minutes
recipe_notes: Keep butter cold during lamination process for flaky layers

title: Bhatura
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour||1/4 cup plain yogurt||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon sugar||1/4 teaspoon baking powder||2 tablespoons oil||Water as needed||Oil for deep frying
instructions: Mix flour, salt, sugar, and baking powder||Add yogurt and oil||Add water gradually to form soft dough||Knead well and rest 2 hours||Divide into 8 portions||Roll into ovals||Deep fry until puffed and golden||Drain and serve hot with chole
recipe_notes: Roll not too thin for good puffing during frying

title: Cornbread
ingredients: 1 cup cornmeal||1 cup all-purpose flour||1/4 cup sugar||1 tablespoon baking powder||1/2 teaspoon salt||1 cup milk||1/3 cup vegetable oil||1 egg||2 tablespoons melted butter
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F||Mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt||In another bowl whisk milk, oil, and egg||Combine wet and dry ingredients||Pour into greased 8-inch pan||Bake 20-25 minutes until golden||Brush top with melted butter||Cool before cutting
recipe_notes: Serve warm with honey butter for best taste

title: Pitha (Rice Cake)
ingredients: 2 cups rice flour||1 cup milk||1/2 cup jaggery||1/4 cup grated coconut||2 tablespoons ghee||1/2 teaspoon cardamom powder||Pinch of salt
instructions: Heat milk and dissolve jaggery||Add rice flour gradually while stirring||Cook until thick paste||Add coconut, ghee, and cardamom||Mix well and cool slightly||Shape into small cakes||Steam for 15 minutes||Serve warm or at room temperature
recipe_notes: Can also be pan-fried for crispy exterior

title: Pretzel Bread
ingredients: 3 cups bread flour||1 cup warm water||2 teaspoons active dry yeast||1 teaspoon sugar||1 1/2 teaspoons salt||2 tablespoons melted butter||1/4 cup baking soda||Coarse salt for topping
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water||Mix flour and salt||Add water mixture and butter||Knead until smooth||Rise 1 hour||Shape into pretzel||Boil water with baking soda||Dip pretzel in baking soda solution||Place on baking sheet||Sprinkle with coarse salt||Bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes
recipe_notes: Baking soda bath gives authentic pretzel flavor and color

title: Dal Puri
ingredients: For dough: 2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tbsp oil, water||For filling: 1 cup chana dal, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1/2 tsp red chili, salt, 2 tbsp oil
instructions: Soak dal for 2 hours||Grind coarsely with spices||Cook dal mixture until dry||Make dough with flour, salt, oil, and water||Rest 30 minutes||Roll small circles||Place filling, seal edges||Roll gently without breaking||Cook on tawa until golden spots
recipe_notes: Don't roll too thin to prevent filling from coming out

title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour||1 cup warm milk||1/4 cup sugar||2 teaspoons active dry yeast||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 cup butter melted||1 egg||For filling: 1/3 cup butter, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp cinnamon||For glaze: 1 cup powdered sugar, 3 tbsp milk
instructions: Make dough with flour, milk, sugar, yeast, salt, butter, and egg||Rise 1.5 hours||Roll into rectangle||Spread filling mixture||Roll up tightly||Cut into 12 rolls||Place in greased pan||Rise 45 minutes||Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes||Drizzle with glaze while warm
recipe_notes: Cut with dental floss for clean spirals

title: Kulcha
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup plain yogurt||1/2 teaspoon baking powder||1/2 teaspoon salt||1 teaspoon sugar||2 tablespoons oil||2-3 tablespoons water||Butter for brushing||Nigella seeds for topping
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar||Add yogurt and oil||Mix and add water gradually||Knead soft dough||Rest 2 hours||Divide into 6 portions||Roll oval shapes||Sprinkle nigella seeds||Cook on hot tawa||Brush with butter||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Can be finished in oven for restaurant-style charred spots

title: English Muffins
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour||1 cup warm milk||2 tablespoons sugar||1 teaspoon active dry yeast||1 teaspoon salt||2 tablespoons melted butter||Cornmeal for dusting
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm milk||Mix flour and salt||Add milk mixture and butter||Knead smooth dough||Rise 1 hour||Roll 3/4 inch thick||Cut with round cutter||Dust with cornmeal||Rise 30 minutes||Cook on griddle 7-8 minutes each side||Cool on wire rack
recipe_notes: Cook on low heat to ensure interior cooks through

title: Keema Naan
ingredients: For dough: 2 cups flour, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1 tsp yeast, 1 tsp sugar, salt, oil||For keema: 250g minced meat, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp ginger, spices, oil
instructions: Make naan dough and let rise 2 hours||Cook keema with onions, garlic, ginger, and spices until dry||Cool completely||Divide dough into 6 portions||Roll circles||Place keema filling||Seal edges and roll gently||Cook on hot tawa||Brush with butter||Serve hot
recipe_notes: Ensure keema is completely cooled before stuffing

title: Zucchini Bread
ingredients: 2 cups grated zucchini||1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 cup vegetable oil||3/4 cup sugar||2 eggs||1 teaspoon vanilla||1 teaspoon baking soda||1/2 teaspoon salt||1 teaspoon cinnamon||1/2 cup chopped walnuts
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F||Squeeze excess moisture from zucchini||Mix oil, sugar, eggs, and vanilla||Add zucchini||In separate bowl mix flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon||Combine wet and dry ingredients||Fold in walnuts||Pour into greased loaf pan||Bake 55-60 minutes
recipe_notes: Squeeze zucchini well to prevent soggy bread

title: Ghur Pitha (Jaggery Rice Cake)
description: Sweet Bengali rice cake with jaggery
ingredients: 2 cups rice flour||1 cup milk||3/4 cup jaggery||1/2 cup grated coconut||2 tablespoons ghee||1/2 teaspoon cardamom powder||Pinch of salt||Banana leaves for wrapping optional
instructions: Heat milk and dissolve jaggery||Add rice flour gradually||Cook stirring continuously until thick||Add coconut, ghee, and cardamom||Cool slightly||Shape into portions||Wrap in banana leaves if using||Steam for 20 minutes||Serve warm
recipe_notes: Banana leaves add traditional aroma and prevent sticking
